basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced Software Engineer generalist with a strong interest in Game Play, and AI programming.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Worked with product managers to implement in game telemetry, created various features for different platforms, including IOS/Android, and PC games. Also responsible for enhancing, implementing and debugging code for different parts of the games.
highlights: Worked with artists to develop player animation and movement code
Developed AI behaviors, and a system that used dynamic navigation mesh
Profiled and optimized server-side (Lua/C++) code to improve performance
Implemented HUD features such as objective system
Refactored server logging system initialization to improve log coverage at startup.

work.name: Trion Worlds
work.summary: Developed automated load test scenarios, implemented UI features, performed feature development and maintenance of platform products. Also designed and developed Distributed Testing Service.
highlights: Released part of the Trion Platform Foundation code base

work.name: Midway
work.summary: Implemented features, fixed bugs, and created tools aimed at improving workflow. Contributed to the Unreal Engine 3 based Core Technology Platform code used across all Midway's games.
